Invalid date format
tests.expected_output: [  ERROR] - First 8 bytes should be in ISO 8601 format YYYYMMDD

tests.description: PAA-cert and paa-key mismatch (Provided DAC_key as key and PAA-cert as cert)
tests.expected_output: [  ERROR] - PAA certificate and private key do not match

tests.description: VID, PID mismatch with pai-cert
tests.expected_output: [  ERROR] - PAI certificate VID and PID do not match input VID and PID

tests.description: Certificate validity period outside parent certificate
tests.expected_output: [  ERROR] - PAI Certificate validity period is outside the specified parameters

tests.description: DS peripheral with c3 target
tests.command: esp-matter-mfg-tool -cn "My bulb" -v 0x1001 -p 0x1001 --paa -c test_data/Chip-Test-PAA-NoVID-Cert.pem -k test_data/Chip-Test-PAA-NoVID-Key.pem -cd test_data/Chip-Test-CD-FFF2-8001.der --ds --target esp32c3
tests.expected_output: [  ERROR] - DS peripheral is only supported for esp32h2 target

tests.description: DS peripheral with esp32h2 target but without efuse-key
tests.command: esp-matter-mfg-tool -cn "My bulb" -v 0x1001 -p 0x1001 --paa -c test_data/Chip-Test-PAA-NoVID-Cert.pem -k test_data/Chip-Test-PAA-NoVID-Key.pem -cd test_data/Chip-Test-CD-FFF2-8001.der --ds --target esp32h2
tests.expected_output: [  ERROR] - --efuse-key-id <value> is required when -ds or --ds-peripheral option is used

tests.description: DS peripheral, esp32h2, efuse-key-id 1
tests.command: esp-matter-mfg-tool -cn "My bulb" -v 0x1001 -p 0x1001 --paa -c test_data/Chip-Test-PAA-NoVID-Cert.pem -k test_data/Chip-Test-PAA-NoVID-Key.pem -cd test_data/Chip-Test-CD-FFF2-8001.der --ds --target esp32h2 --efuse-key-id 1

tests.description: Partition count greater than 1 with port argument
tests.expected_output: [  ERROR] - Port not specified or number of partitions count is greater than 1

Error: commissionable-data-in-secure-cert without other required options
tests.expected_output: [  ERROR] - If --commissionable-data-in-secure-cert or --rd-id-uid-in-secure-cert is provided, then --dac-in-secure-cert, --commissionable-data-in-secure-cert, and --rd-id-uid-in-secure-cert are mandatory

tests.description: Error: rd-id-uid-in-secure-cert without other required options

tests.description: Error: commissionable-data-in-secure-cert with only dac-in-secure-cert
tests.expected_output: [  ERROR] - If --commissionable-data-in-secure-cert or --rd-id-uid-in-secure-cert is provided, then --dac-in-secure-cert, --commissionable-data-in-secure-cert, and --rd-id-uid-in-secure-cert are mandatory
